what can be the cost of buying one unit of cord blood

question: My 8yr old daughter has had Type 1 diabetes for over 4yrs & I am currently 16weeks pregnant & hoping this baby will not only be a miracle in itself but a life saver for 1 of my daughters, there is also a strong chance this child may fall prone to the condition as my only sister & my father & his aunty & the list goes on...  I would be happy to hear about anything that may lead us to better life :-)
title: Looking for research on Cord Blood & Islet Transplants for Diabetes
